item.description:
Indoor Boot Camp class located at Julie Hart Fitness Studio 1285 Washington Street, Weymouth, MA. (rt 53)
Date: February 20th
Time: 11:30 AM
Description: 1 hour class
Cost: $8

This boot Camp class will work your entire body, muscles and heart by going from one exercise to the next with little rest. This workout will include calisthenics like pushups, jumping jacks, crunches and other body weight exercises... I will also add some weights into the mix. It is time to challenge your body to the limit and burn calories like crazy! You can stick around for a Question and Answer type seminar on Nutrition and what Julie's Personal Training Studio offers after the stretch.

Weather permitting, a portion of this class may be held outdoors. Please dress appropriately.

Max capacity: 8 people,
now opened up to one guest per group member

RSVP Deadline: Friday, February 19th @ 5pm ~ Please see our No-Show Policy on the About Us page for more info on RSVP Deadlines.

If you have not attended a class at Julie's studio before, please fill out a Medical History form which is in the Files Section saved as Julie Hart's form. You can bring it with you that day.


Class offered by:

Julie Armstrong
Owner Julie Hart Fitness
(781) 367-7397
www.juliehartfitness.com

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Boot Camp Class
